my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Adakah kamu perasan sesuatu?

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Alif yakin huruf Hijaiyah pertama ada berdekatan.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: @user!

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Adakah anda dapat mengesan huruf Hijaiyah pertama, `Alif`?

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: Yeay! Huruf pertama sudah dijumpai.

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: Bagus sekali, @user! Kayu ini bentuk sama huruf Hijaiyah 'ālif'.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Betul Tuah, kayu ini berdiri tegak seperti huruf Hijaiyah 'ālif'

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Ayuh, kita cari huruf Hijaiyah yang seterusnya.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: I'm certain the first Hijaiyah letter is near by.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Can you spot the first Hijaiyah letter, `Alif`?

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: The first Hijaiyah letter has been found!

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Yes, this tree looks just like the first Hijaiyah letter, `Alif`.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Let's continue our journey to find the next Hijaiyah letters.

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: Alamak! Bagaimana Alif?

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Iya la Tuah...

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: @user!

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: Kami perlukan bantuan kamu untuk alihkan pokok ini.

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: Jalan kita sudah dibuka ~meow. Terima kasih @user.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Dan kita juga telah temui huruf Hijaiyah yang kedua iaitu `Ba`.

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: Dahan pokok dan bunga di bawahnya membentuk huruf `Ba`.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Betul, Tuah.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Dan kita hanya perlu mencari huruf Hijaiyah `Ta` dan `Tsa`.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: Oh no! What do we do, Alif?

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: This is bad. We can't get past this branch.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: We need your help moving this branch out of the way.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: Hooray! We can continue on our path thanks to @user.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: And we've also found the next Hijaiyah letter, `Ba`.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: Ah~ the branch and the flower below it look like the Hijaiyah letter `Ba`.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: So now we only need to find `Ta` and `Tsa`.

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: Lihat! Ada anak burung terjatuh dari sarangnya.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Ayuh! Bantu anak burung itu ke sangkarnya.

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: Anak burung itu sudah selamat. Dan huruf Hijaiyah ketiga sudah kelihatan.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Dapatkah @user cari huruf tersebut?

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: Tepat sekali, dua ekor burung di sarang berbentuk huruf Hijaiyah Ta.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: The baby bird has fell out of its nest.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Rescue that baby bird and place it back in its nest.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: You have saved the baby bird.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: ...the third Hijaiyah letter can also be spotted now!

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: That is correct! The baby birds with the nest look like...

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Alhamdulillah, we sure are lucky to have you with us, @user.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Let's continue on our journey now.

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: Kita sudah di hujung jalan.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Pintu pagar dapat dibuka. Mahukah anda tolong bukakan pintu dihadapan?

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Terima kasih, @user. Huruf terakhir Hijaiyah hari ini dapat ditemukan.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: Alright, seems like we're at the end of this path.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: But there's a gate blocking our way.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Seems like we can open the gate.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: @user, will you help us open the gate?

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: I think that was the final Hijaiyah letter for this path.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Tuah, sudah lama kita berjalan. Alif juga rasa haus teramat!

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: Saya nampak ada sesuatu disebalik rumput tersebut. Mari kita melihat apa itu!

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Wah! nasib kita amatlah baik, Tuah! Segelas air di sebalik rumput tersebut.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: @user, kami perlukan bantuan anda untuk mengambil gelas air itu.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Yeay! Hilang rasa haus! Huruf Hijaiyah pertama harini telah dijumpai!

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Ayuh, kita meneruskan perjalanan kita!

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Tuah, we've been walking for a while.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: I think I see something ahead in the grass.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Is that a jug of lemonade?

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: @user, can you please help pass that jug of lemonade?

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: And with that, we have also found...

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: ...the first Hijaiyah letter for this path!

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Yep, the jug of lemonade looks like the letter, `Jim`

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Alright, let us continue on this path.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Tuah, terdapat seekor angsa di kolam itu yang mahu makan.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: @user, tolong berikan makanan kepadanya!

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Yeay! Terima kasih, @user kerana memberi angsa makan. Kini kita telah jumpa huruf hijaiyah kita yang kedua!

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: Oh, it's a goose in the pond.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Hey @user, can you help feed the goose?

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Masha Allah, that goose is pretty.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: It also looks like the second Hijaiyah letter for this path...

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Great work, @user. That was a good find.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Tuah! Selepas berjalan disekeliling kawasan ini, tiada buah-buahan yang tumbuh di atas pokok-pokok di sini.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Wah! Tuah, terdapat sebuah pokok epal di kawasan ini!

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Bolehkah @user bantu kami dengan memetik epal tersebut?

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: Terima kasih, @user. Huruf Hijaiyah ketiga, kha, hari ini telah ditemui.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: It's weird that the trees that we passed...

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: Look at that, there's an apple tree!

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: @user, can you help us pick one of those apples?

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Thanks, @user! You picked a delicious apple.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: @user also found the third Hijaiyah letter for this path, `Kha`.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Tuah, sudah lama kita berjalan. Mari berhenti dan cari makanan.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Tuah, terdapat sepotong tembikai di atas bangku tersebut!

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: @user, boleh bantu kami mengambil sedikit tembikai tersebut?

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Terima kasih, @user. Huruf Hijaiyah pertama kita untuk hari ini telah ditemui!

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Tuah, we've been walking for a while.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: We should stop to look for something to eat.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: Alif, I think I see a watermelon up ahead.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: Alif, I think I see a watermelon up ahead.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: @user, can you please help fetch that watermelon.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: You've also found the first Hijaiyah letter for this path.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Tuah, terdapat seekor udang galah terdampar di atas daun itu.

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: @user, tolong kami selamatkan udang tersebut dan masukkannya semula kedalam kolam.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Terima kasih, @user. Kini udang telah masuk kedalam kolamnya. Kita juga telah menemui huruf Hijaiyah kedua untuk hari ini.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Tuah, there's a stranded lobster on a leaf.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: You need to help it get back into the pond.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Thank you, @user. The lobster has returned to it's pond.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: We've also found the second Hijaiyah letter for today.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Lihat di sana! Monyet sedang makan pisang Tuah!

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: @user, bantu saya untuk mengambil balik pisang saya dari monyet tersebut!

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: Terima kasih, @user. Kini kita telah menemui huruf Hijaiyah ketiga kita untuk hari ini!

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: There is a monkey eating your banana!

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: @user, help me get my banana back.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: We have also found the third Hijaiyah letter for today.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Wah! Tuah, lihat. Ada pokok chili.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: @user, tolong kami petik chili dari pohon pokok itu.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Terima kasih, @user. Kini kita telah menemui huruf Hijaiyah terakhir kita untuk hari ini.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: @user, can you help us pick the chili from the tree?

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: The final Hijaiyah letter for today.

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: Wah, Si Gayut sedang bergayut riang di sana.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Dahan itu menyerupai huruf Hijaiyah. Tapi huruf apa iya?

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: Dahan itu bergulung membentuk huruf 'Sin'. Sesuai Si Gayut bergayut riang.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: It looks like a Hijaiyah letter.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: But which letter could it be?

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: Do you think you can help us figure it out?

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: That makes a lot of sense!

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: Which makes it perfect for swinging around.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: We've now found the first Hijaiyah letter for today.

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: Alif, lihat di atas sana!

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: Bukankah itu anak-anak kecil Si Gayut sebentar tadi?

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Si Gayut, barangkali sedang mencari makanan untuk Si Kecil.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Bijak sekali, @user! Telatah Si Kecil itu melengkap bentuk huruf Hijaiyah 'Shin'.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: @user, can you see what those are?

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: You're right, that looks like the letter `Shin`.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: I'm guessing Mr.Monkey was looking for food for them.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: The little monkeys playing around the branches...

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: ...looks similar to our second Hijaiyah letter today.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Tahukah Tuah iguana dapat merubah warna badannya?

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: Nampaknya kepala iguana ini juga mirip huruf Hijaiyah. Adakah ia satu kebolahan yang lain?

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: @user punya penglihatan yang tajam. Baik sekali.

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: Lidah serta kepalanya mirip huruf 'Sād'

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: Dan benar kata Alif, warnanya berubah dari hijau ke biru malap.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: ...iguanas can change the color of their bodies?

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: It seems like its head looks familiar.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Does it have a secret ability?

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: @user has the eyes of an eagle!

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Its tongue and head make up the letter 'Sād'

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: It changed colours, just like you said it would.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Tuah, masih mahu berjalan mencari huruf lagi?

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: Di sana terdapat khemah dan tinggalan unggun api.

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: Dapatlah kita berehat sebentar. Tapi... cerek itu seperti pernah Tuah lihat.

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: Hebat, huruf Hijaiyah 'Dād' sudah pun ditemui.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Asap di cerek itu seperti sudah ditinggalkan.

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: Iya, Alif. Dapat kita masuk dan berehat dahulu. Tidakkah begitu?

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Tuah, do you want to continue?

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: I don't think there are any more Hijaiyah letters.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: There seems to be a tent and campfire.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: We can rest here and clear our minds.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: I think I've seen that pot before...

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: The next letters should be `Tha`, `Zha`, `Ain`, and `Ghain`.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: Actually, I can see one right here!

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Yes, this axe looks like the letter `Tha`.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: I see a boat ahead of us, Alif.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: We can cross this lake with it.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: Can you help push the boat into water?

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: We have also found the Hijaiyah letter `Zha`

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: The second Hijaiyah letter for today!

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: Alif, do you see that plant up ahead?

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: This is a Venus Fly Trap.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: It eats small insects and it's found in forests.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: It also resembles the shape of a Hijaiyah letter.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: The mouth of the plant opens wide...

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Which makes it look like the letter `Ain`.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: The feathers on its head remind me...

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: I thought it looked like the letter `Ghain`.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: That makes this the final Hijaiyah letter for today.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Come on, let's continue our journey.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: We are close to reaching our destination.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: Wow, there is a beautiful pond right there.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: Alif, did you see the fish jump?

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: The fish looked like a Hijaiyah letter.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Can @user find the match the fish...

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: We're lucky to have you with us.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Tuah, there's some shade up ahead.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: Alif, look! There's a bird on the branch.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: That bird's position on the tree...

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: Can @user help us figure out what Hijaiyah letter it is?

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Tuah, there's something in front of us.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: Alif, that is a Candy Cane.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: Someone must have left it here.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: Alif, you are not allowed to take...

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: It does remind me of a Hijaiyah letter.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: It also reminds me of a Hijaiyah letter.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Can @user see what Hijaiyah letter it is?

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Is that boat with a red flag?

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: What Hijaiyah letter does it resemble?

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: Alright, let's continue on this path.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: I think I see another boat up ahead.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: It looks like another Hijaiyah letter.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: @user, can you recognize what Hijaiyah letter does it resemble?

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: The knot tied to the boat...

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: It also looks like a Hijaiyah letter.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: That is the first Hijaiyah letter for this path.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Why is it lying on the ground?

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: ...is that it looks like a Hijaiyah letter!
